original_solution_mapping.L1: The mother is 41 years old now, so 5 years ago she was 41-5=<<41-5=36>>36 years old
original_solution_mapping.L2: At that time the daughter's age was half hers so the daughter was 36/2=<<36/2=18>>18 years old
original_solution_mapping.L3: Now (5 years after that time) the daughter is 18+5=23 years old
original_solution_mapping.L4: In 3 years, the daughter will be 23+3=<<23+3=26>>26 years old

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4970.
    Returns: the daughter's age in 3 years.
    """
    # L1
    mother_current_age = 41 # mother is 41 years old now
    years_ago = 5 # 5 years ago
    mother_age_five_years_ago = mother_current_age - years_ago

    # L2
    half_divisor = 2 # half hers
    daughter_age_five_years_ago = mother_age_five_years_ago / half_divisor

    # L3
    daughter_current_age = daughter_age_five_years_ago + years_ago

    # L4
    years_in_future = 3 # in 3 years
    daughter_age_in_three_years = daughter_current_age + years_in_future

    # FA
    answer = daughter_age_in_three_years
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The mother is {mother_current_age} years old now, so {years_ago} years ago she was {mother_current_age}-{years_ago}=<<{mother_current_age}-{years_ago}={mother_age_five_years_ago}>>{mother_age_five_years_ago} years old

At that time the daughter's age was half hers so the daughter was {mother_age_five_years_ago}/{half_divisor}=<<{mother_age_five_years_ago}/{half_divisor}={daughter_age_five_years_ago}>>{daughter_age_five_years_ago} years old
Now ({years_ago} years after that time) the daughter is {daughter_age_five_years_ago}+{years_ago}={daughter_current_age} years old

In {years_in_future} years, the daughter will be {daughter_current_age}+{years_in_future}=<<{daughter_current_age}+{years_in_future}={daughter_age_in_three_years}>>{daughter_age_in_three_years} years old

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: The mother is 41 years old now, so 5 years ago she was 41-5=<<41-5=36>>36 years old
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: At that time the daughter's age was half hers so the daughter was 2/2=<<2/2=1>>1 years old
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Now (5 years after that time) the daughter is 1+5=6 years old
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: In 3 years, the daughter will be 6+3=<<6+3=9>>9 years old

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'half_divisor' (value: 2) was used instead of 'mother_age_five_years_ago' (value: 36).
